name: Web-Control-Panel
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Web Control Panel used for CommuniLink hosting

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<td width="598" align="CENTER"><font face="Verdana,Arial,Helvetica" size="-2" color="#DFFFDF"><b>Welcome to the <font[\s]+color="yellow">([^<]+)<\/font> Server<\/b><\/font><\/td>)

(?-mix:([^<]+)<\/a><\/strong>
New Webmail by CommuniLink\. Many new features added and support multi-language\.<\/td>)
